            Hi there
            Iâ€™m Julia; I also go by Julie.
            Iâ€™m a marine ecologist and founded Openscapes to champion kinder, better science in less time. My main focus is how open source, data science, and environmental research can empower us to uncover climate solutions faster by working together as inclusive teams and communities.
            
            
            Experience
            2018-present: Founder & Co-Director, Openscapes
            2018-2019: Mozilla Fellow
            2013-present: Senior Fellow/Ocean Health Index program lead, NCEAS, UC Santa Barbara

articles.title: projects
articles.contents:
Openscapes




Openscapes Champions Program


A love letter to coord_polar() masquerading as a #rstats zine, 2021






NASA Openscapes


a shiny app of a short looping video of a cloudscape, 2021





Ocean Health Index
I was part of the Ocean Health Index team from 2013-2019, where I was a science program lead and helped amplify our transitions to open data science.




Our path to better science in less time using open data science tools


Data visualization and analysis for Here Say Media, 2021






OHI Science Website


Data visualization and analysis for Here Say Media, 2021





Open communities




Carpentries


A celebration and showcase of art in all of its forms created by the #rstats community. An entry for the RStudio 2021 Shiny Competition, 2021






RLadies


An R package for creating patterns using geom_contour(), 2021
